channel.title: How do i make Pvp point shop? PLEASE HELP
channel.description:
1.) i already have the pk point into my server but i want to kno how i can make a shop a pk point shop and you can only use points to buy items instead of coins.
2.) how can i make my general store be able to any times cuz atm it doesnt let u.
3.)why does my skull glitch on my head when i have an over head pray on?
